text: I ended up having a really good conversation with someone today. I didn’t expect it to be anything deep—I thought it would just be a quick chat—but once we started talking, I realized how much I’d been keeping to myself lately. It felt good to actually say things out loud instead of letting them rattle around in my head. They didn’t try to give me dramatic advice or anything; they mostly just listened, which honestly helped more than anything. I walked away feeling lighter, like I’d been carrying more than I realized.
title: A Helpful Conversation
